description: Rules for mapping natural language spatial commands to specific logical target IDs on a base plate.

visual_rows.Back: The edge furthest from the camera view (Top side of the plate in image).
visual_rows.Center_Row: The middle horizontal section of the plate.
visual_rows.Front: The edge closest to the camera view (Bottom side of the plate in image).

visual_columns.Left: The left side of the plate in the image.
visual_columns.Right: The right side of the plate in the image.

example_mapping.instruction: Place cylinder on the front-right corner of base1.
example_mapping.reasoning: 1. Identify 'base1'. 2. Locate 'Front' (Bottom edge). 3. Locate 'Right' (Right edge). 4. Intersection is bottom-right corner.
